verses.verse: Moreover the word <S%H1697><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> came unto me <S%H559><s%>, saying,
Son <S%H1121><s%> of man <S%H120><s%>, set <S%H7760><s%> thy face <S%H6440><s%> against mount <S%H2022><s%> Seir <S%H8165><s%>, and prophesy against it <S%H5012><s%>,

and say <S%H559><s%> unto it <S%H559><s%>, Thus saith the Lord <S%H136><s%> Jehovah <S%H136><s%>: Behold <S%H2022><s%>, I am against thee, O mount Seir <S%H8165><s%>, and I will stretch out <S%H5186><s%> my hand <S%H3027><s%> against thee <S%H5414><s%>, and I will make thee a desolation <S%H8077><s%> and an astonishment <S%H8077><s%>.
I will lay <S%H7760><s%> thy cities <S%H5892><s%> waste <S%H2723><s%>, and thou shalt be desolate <S%H8077><s%>; and thou shalt know <S%H3045><s%> that I am Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>.

Because thou hast had a perpetual <S%H5769><s%> enmity <S%H342><s%>, and hast given <S%H5064><s%> over the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> to the power <S%H3027><s%> of the sword <S%H2719><s%> in the time <S%H6256><s%> of their calamity <S%H343><s%>, in the time <S%H6256><s%> of the iniquity <S%H5771><s%> of the end <S%H7093><s%>;

therefore <S%H2416><s%>, as I live, saith <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> Jehovah <S%H3069><s%>, I will prepare <S%H6213><s%> thee unto blood <S%H1818><s%>, and blood <S%H1818><s%> shall pursue <S%H7291><s%> thee <S%H518><s%>: since thou hast not hated <S%H8130><s%> blood <S%H1818><s%>, therefore blood <S%H1818><s%> shall pursue thee <S%H7291><s%>.

Thus will I make <S%H5414><s%> mount <S%H2022><s%> Seir <S%H8165><s%> an <S%H8077><s%> astonishment <S%H8077><s%> and a desolation <S%H8077><s%>; and I will cut off <S%H3772><s%> from it him that passeth through and him that returneth <S%H7725><s%>.

And I will fill <S%H4390><s%> its mountains <S%H2022><s%> with its slain <S%H2491><s%>: in thy hills <S%H1389><s%> and in thy valleys <S%H1516><s%> and in all thy watercourses <S%H650><s%> shall they fall <S%H5307><s%> that are slain <S%H2491><s%> with the sword <S%H2719><s%>.

I will make <S%H5414><s%> thee a perpetual <S%H5769><s%> desolation <S%H8077><s%>, and thy cities <S%H5892><s%> shall not be inhabited <S%H7725><s%>; and ye shall know <S%H3045><s%> that I am Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>.

Because thou hast said <S%H559><s%>, These two <S%H8147><s%> nations <S%H1471><s%> and these two <S%H8147><s%> countries <S%H776><s%> shall be mine <S%H3423><s%>, and we will possess it <S%H3068><s%>; whereas Jehovah was there:

therefore <S%H2416><s%>, as I live, saith <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> Jehovah <S%H136><s%>, I will do <S%H6213><s%> according to thine anger <S%H639><s%>, and according to thine envy <S%H7068><s%> which thou hast showed <S%H6213><s%> out of thy hatred <S%H8135><s%> against them <S%H3045><s%>; and I will make myself known among them <S%H8199><s%>, when I shall judge thee.

And thou shalt know <S%H3045><s%> that I <S%H3068><s%>, Jehovah, have heard <S%H8085><s%> all thy revilings <S%H5007><s%> which thou hast spoken <S%H559><s%> against the mountains <S%H2022><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>, They are laid desolate <S%H8074><s%>, they are given <S%H5414><s%> us to devour <S%H402><s%>.
And ye have magnified <S%H1431><s%> yourselves against me with your mouth <S%H6310><s%>, and have multiplied <S%H6280><s%> your words <S%H1697><s%> against me <S%H8085><s%>: I have heard it.
Thus saith <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> Jehovah <S%H3069><s%>: When the whole earth <S%H776><s%> rejoiceth <S%H8055><s%>, I will make <S%H6213><s%> thee desolate <S%H8077><s%>.

As thou didst rejoice <S%H8057><s%> over the inheritance <S%H5159><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, because it was desolate <S%H8074><s%>, so will I do <S%H6213><s%> unto thee <S%H8077><s%>: thou shalt be desolate, O mount <S%H2022><s%> Seir <S%H8165><s%>, and all Edom <S%H123><s%>, even all of it <S%H3045><s%>; and they shall know that I am Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>.
